DONATE_DESC: Radio Rasclat is a non-commercial radio stations based on donations, backers and sponsors.
PROJECT_DESCRIPTION: Radio Rasclat is a non-commercial internet radio station which is going to stream your music to the web, again! It offers you a platform to play & try out. It serves as a place for the exchange, dialogue and cooperation of music. Founded and curated in 2019, the radio returns to the new venue at KMMN 3.
OPEN_SOURCE_DESC: Diese Radio-Web-App ist Open Source und basiert auf Angular, NodeJS, Express und MongoDB. Der vollständige Source Code befindet sich auf
